title: Uchi no Kamisama ni wa Gakkari da!
original_name: うちの神様にはがっかりだ!
sinopse:
Yuuto Higurashi gets picked up on the street, but it turns out that the good-looking man is Masakazu Oohataya, a schoolmate from his junior school and a shinto priest at the Azuma Shrine. How is Yuuto going to react since he's Masakazu's first and second love?

(Source: MU)
